title: Ariel Winter spotted on solo errand run in Los Angeles after confirming breakup with Levi Meaden
text:
She's newly single following the end of her three year relationship with Levi Meaden.

And Ariel Winter was spotted on a solo errand run in Los Angeles on Saturday looking as fresh and clean as her newly clean slate.

The actress, 21, sported a makeup-free face and a simple monochromatic ensemble for the weekend outing.

New beginnings: Ariel Winter, 21, was spotted on a solo errand run in Los Angeles on Saturday looking as fresh and clean as her newly clean slate

Winter's casual look consisted of a black T-shirt, black leggings and flip flops.

She wore her raven tresses up in a messy bun as she carried a water bottle in one hand and hey keys and wallet and phone in the other.

The Sofia the First voice-over actress stoked speculation that she was single after she was spotted on a dinner date with a mystery man on Tuesday.

Then on Friday, Us Weekly confirmed the breakup between Winter and her 32-year old beau.

Simplicity: The actress sported a makeup-free face and a simple monochromatic ensemble for the weekend outing

Weekend warrior: Winter wore her raven tresses up in a messy bun as she carried a water bottle in one hand and hey keys and wallet and phone in the other

Winter, who was typically inseparable from the Pacific Rim: Uprising actor, had not been pictured with him since August.

The couple first started dating in November 2016 and moved in together the following year when Winter was 19 and Meaden was nearly 30.

After discussing her living situation with Jimmy Kimmel, the actress found herself having to publicly defend their age difference.

'I'm happy, and whatever people want to say, they can say,' she said during an interview with Refinery 29 in May of 2017.

It's been a while: Winter, who was typically inseparable from Levi Meaden, 32, had not been pictured with him since August (pictured on January 6 in Los Angeles)

'I'm super happy with the arrangement we that we have. We love living together. It's just great,' she continued.

Change is definitely in the air for Winter.

Her longtime role as Alex Dunphy on the hit ABC series Modern Family is coming to an end next year, when they show wraps after 11 seasons.

She was just 11 years old when she began her run on the hugely successful sitcom that stars Sofia Vergara and Ed O'Neil in the lead roles.

'It's strange to think that it's coming to an end. It will be hard to say goodbye,' Winter told The Hollywood Reporter.

'It will be hard to leave that, but I am excited to do new things. I'm excited to play new roles and to do things that challenge me a little more,' she added.

Season of change: Ariel's longtime role as Alex Dunphy on the hit ABC series Modern Family is coming to an end next year, when they show wraps after 11 seasons (pictured in 2009)
description: Her hit show is coming to an end this season and her  relationship came to an end days ago. Winter was spotted on a solo errand run Saturday looking as fresh and clean as her newly clean slate.
